results.title: Home Decal Live, Laugh, Love Art Sticker Vinyl Decal Modern Transfer For Entry Way Family Living Room Vinyl Wall Lettering-H-122
results.description:
This quote would be great in any home.  "Live every moment, Laugh Every Day, Love Beyond Words.
 
Vinyl wall lettering is very thin, about the thickness of three coats of paint, and it is applied like a sticker. Your vinyl wall sayings will be sent to you as pre-spaced, pre-pasted. Cut the lettering into pieces or sections if you want, and press onto your wall, tile, window, or other flat surface.

All of our products are made with high grade removable vinyl. This product creates a hand painted finished look. Our vinyl is removable, but not reusable.

We ship with in 1-3 business days, through the Post Office.

~If you need a different size, please convo us to find about price.~

***Vinyl will have difficulty sticking to walls that have paint that has "stain resistant paint", "easy care paint", paint with Teflon, or low or no VOC's.  It will stick to lightly textured walls like "Orange Peel" walls.  If you are concerned with the vinyl sticking, please ask us you to send you a vinyl sample free of charge. ***

Thanks for stopping by!

results.title: 30 oz All You Need Is Love Coffee Mug Tumbler | Love Is All You Need | Love You Forever Coffee Mug | Gift For Valentine | Gift For Love
results.description:
All You Need Is Love

Grab this fun cool tumbler as the perfect gift for yourself or the special someone in your life that you love. 

Our Travel Tumblers are Laser Etched, 30oz Vacuum Sealed and Double Insulated. 

Use this tumbler to drink up your favorite beverage! Perfect gift for birthdays, holidays, graduations or anytime you wanna show some love to beer lovers.

This super cool travel tumbler coffee mug is made out of powder coated stainless steel which is then laser etched to reveal the custom design.

We have a ton of designs from the funny or crude, to the cute and sweet. Our unique tumblers make great gifts. 

DETAILS: 
These large tumblers keep your hot drinks hot and your cold drinks cold for at least 24 hours! Perfect for sipping on hot coffee or tea in the mornings or keeping your cold beverages cold for hours while you are out camping or picnicking or at any events!

☞ 30oz Tumblers are made from powder coated stainless steel.
☞ The tumbler is double wall vacuum insulated.
☞ Gives 2X heat and cold retention compared to plastic tumblers.
☞ Made from BPA Free materials with narrow design to fit most cup holders.
☞ Sweat free. No wet rings on tables.

HAPPINESS GUARANTEE:

We pack our mugs securely to ensure a safe delivery, but rest assured, if a mug does arrive broken from transit, we will always replace it free of charge. (just send us a quick photo of the broken mug).

SHIPPING TIMES:

Most orders arrive within 7 to 10 days of the order being placed (within United States).
Canada, Australia and the UK are also usually 7 to 10 days but can occasionally take longer.
International Orders* are usually made and shipped within a few days, but can take up to 6 weeks to arrive depending where they are going.

*We are happy to send our mugs anywhere in the world, we will pack and address accordingly, but we have no control over the shipping / postal delivery services in other countries, and cannot be held at fault if we ship a mug to an obscure part of the world, and it doesn't arrive, or takes longer than expected.

Notes: 

1: Colors may vary from what you see on your screen, as every screen is different.
2: If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.
3: Remember each mug is made to order, so slight variances may occur.

Ready to Order?

Simply click the Buy Now or Add to Cart button and complete your order details.

results.title: Live, Love, Laugh Charm Sterling Silver 14mm, silver Words Charms, Sterling Silver Charms, Live charms, Love charms, Laugh charms - SP383
results.description:
Beautiful Live, Love, Laugh charm.  Casted with 925 Sterling Silver in USA.

0.7 inch high.

14mm x 17.5mm

We offer this charm with different attachments at the top. Based on your requirements, please choose one from the drop down options, All attachments are sterling silver.

1. With Jumpring, this is best if you are using it as a pendant on a neck chain.

2. With springring clasp, this is best suited for charm bracelets.

3. With lobster claw clasps,  this works if you want to attach to any thing with a loop or jumpring.

4. With Large/Big Hole beads, this makes the charm as a charm bead for European bracelets like Pandora, Camila etc.

5. With 16 Inch Sterling silver 1.5mm Flat cable Chain with Spring Ring Closure.

6. With 18 Inch Sterling silver 1.5mm Flat cable Chain with Spring Ring Closure.

7. No attachment, charm only.

For option number 4, please mention which bead you would like.

See all my sterling silver charms
https://www.etsy.com/your/listings?shipping_profile_id=&search_query=sterling+silver+charms

results.title: Explore Dream Discover, vinyl wall decal, living room, teen girl, wall words, wall lettering, removable quote, Explore decal, HH2262
results.description:
Explore Dream Discover

~~PRODUCT DESCRIPTION~~
* Removable vinyl wall decal
* Colors can be selected from color palette from photo listing
* Any sample photo used is for illustrative purposes. Measure area to ensure good fit. Custom sizing is available, please convo for quote.

~~CHECKOUT~~

* Please select COLOR upon checkout

~~ABOUT PRODUCT~~

* Apply decals in area that is out of reach of small children.
* This product is one time application. The decals are removable, but not reusable. 
* Due to condition and age of walls prior to application, small damage may occur upon removal
* Our decals are made with high quality removable vinyl and are custom cut when purchased.
* Our removable high quality matt vinyl decals when applied to the wall look painted on!
* Removable wall decals can be applied to almost all clean, smooth, dust and grease free surface. 
* Please wait at least 3 weeks after painting walls to allow the paint to cure. 
* We recommend installation to smooth, semi-gloss or gloss enamel paint. Avoid matte finish Latex paints and paints that contain anti-graffiti agents or stain blockers as well as Low VOC or VOC free paints, sand paints and suede paints. 
* Not recommended for application to unpainted wood, textured walls, stucco, concrete, brick or over grout lines.
* Included in your order is a FREE test decal as well as detailed step-by-step instructions
* Please see our policies section prior to purchase
http://www.etsy.com/shop/WildEyesSigns/policy?ref=shopinfo_policies_leftnav
 for additional information on our shop

BECOME A FAN ON FACEBOOK
www.facebook.com/wildeyessigns

results.title: Wolf Skeleton Decal - Taxidermy, Werewolf, Loup Garou, Skull, Canine vinyl decal, bumper sticker for cars, laptops
results.description:
Wolves have haunted the minds of men since we first laid eyes upon them. They have terrified us, romanced us, and captivated us with their lonesome cries and flashing eyes. For thousands of years we have asked ourselves the same question: are wolves devils or are they divine? But, then again, aren't all wild things just a little bit of both? 

This premium wolf skeleton decal is available in 2 colors and multiple sizes. If you would like this decal without the text, just let us know in your order notes and we will omit it.

If you would like a size not already listed, send us a note BEFORE you order. Unfortunately, this decal cannot be made in any size smaller than 6 inches wide due to the complexity of the design. 

Interested in a smaller vinyl sticker with this design? See it here:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/737330871/


-------------------------------------------------------


This design was created in house by Mugwump Studios and can't be found anywhere else.

We offer low cost shipping within the US and FREE shipping when you spend $35 or more!
